messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.
How far am I from the Golden Gate Bridge
Could you please share your current location in terms of latitude and longitude? Once I have those coordinates, I can calculate the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge for you.
I don't have my current location info.

No problem. To compute the distance I just need a location reference from you—either  
• Your latitude & longitude coordinates, or  
• Your current city/address (so I can approximate its coordinates).  

If you’re not sure how to get lat/long, you can open a map app (e.g. Google Maps), tap on your location pin, and it should display the coordinates. Let me know whichever you can share!
Can you use your tools to figure out my location? Maybe low battery mode, wifi, or location service could be turned on.

I’m not able to pull your device’s GPS, Wi-Fi, or battery status directly—my tools only work once you supply a location. If you can share either:

• Your current latitude & longitude  
• Or a nearby address/city name  

…then I can calculate the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge for you. Let me know which you can provide!
I don't have any of that info right now.

To get you an estimate, I need at least some reference point. If you don’t have exact coordinates, could you tell me any of the following:

• The city or town you’re in  
• A ZIP/postal code  
• A nearby street intersection or landmark  

With that I can look up approximate coordinates and then calculate the distance to the Golden Gate Bridge. Let me know whatever you can share!
